statements: CREATE TABLE research_projects (id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255), project_description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE research_projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, start_date DATE, lead_researcher VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE research_papers (paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY, paper_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, publication_date DATE, author_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, project_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES research_projects(project_id));
